class.name: AudioEffectGate
class.brief_description: Adds a gate to the audio bus to silence quiet audio.
class.description: Silences audio when it is below a certain volume. Useful for processing microphones with background noise.

members.member: Amount of time it takes the gate to go from 0% to 100% volume when audio goes above the threshold.
Amount of time it takes after audio goes below the threshold for the release envelope to start.
Amount of time it takes the gate to go from 100% to 0% volume after the gate is done holding.
Threshold below which the audio is silenced, in decibels. Value can range from -100 to 0.
